# SecureStringUtility.CopyAsReadOnly method

Makes a read-only copy of the specified string.

```csharp
public static SecureString CopyAsReadOnly(this SecureString secureString)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| secureString | The [`SecureString`](../SecureString.md) to copy. |

## Return Value

A read-only copy of *secureString*.
